video.title: Pokémon: Black & White
video.synopsis: In a distant region, Ash discovers unfamiliar Pokémon that he can't wait to catch in this animated series featuring new lands, rivals and adventures!

episodes.synopsis: Arriving in the Unova region, Ash must suddenly deal with the loss of Pikachu's Electric-type powers.
episodes.title: In the Shadow of Zekrom!

episodes.synopsis: Continuing their journey in the Unova region, Ash and Pikachu come across some new friends, as well as some old rivals.
episodes.title: Enter Iris and Axew!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Striaton City and Ash's first Unova Gym Battle challenge, our Heroes come across a family whose hotel is in dire need of help.
episodes.title: A Sandile Gusher of Change!

episodes.synopsis: On his way to Striaton City and his first Gym Battle challenge in the Unova Region, Ash discovers the Pokémon Battle Club and a new friend as well.
episodes.title: The Battle Club and Tepig's Choice!

episodes.synopsis: As Ash faces off against a most unusual Gym Leader challenge at the Striaton Gym, Team Rocket prepares to embark on the mission of a lifetime.
episodes.title: Triple Leaders, Team Threats!

episodes.synopsis: As Ash's first Unova region Gym Battle challenge continues, Ash discovers a kindred spirit in Cilan - one of the three Striaton City Gym Leaders.
episodes.title: Dreams by the Yard Full!

episodes.synopsis: Continuing onto Nacrene City and his second Gym Battle challenge, Ash comes across an amazing Snivy that proves difficult to catch indeed.
episodes.title: Snivy Plays Hard to Catch!

episodes.synopsis: As our Heroes head toward Nacrene City and Ash's next Gym Battle, they come across a pair of Darumaka behaving in a most peculiar manner.
episodes.title: Saving Darmanitan from the Bell!

episodes.synopsis: A surprise Battle between Iris, Axew, Cilan and Pansage reveals the story of a promise made not so long ago.
episodes.title: The Bloom Is on Axew!

episodes.synopsis: Stopping at a Battle Club on his way to the Nacrene City Gym, Ash is surprised to find that his Unova region rival, Trip, is there as well.
episodes.title: A Rival Battle for Club Champ!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to the Nacrene City Gym, our Heroes come across a Dwebble with an unusual housing problem.
episodes.title: A Home for Dwebble!

episodes.synopsis: Continuing to Nacrene City and Ash's next Gym Battle, our heroes meet a boisterous kindergarten class and its beloved Trubbish.
episodes.title: Here Comes the Trubbish Squad!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Nacrene City, our Heroes run into Professor Juniper's helper, Bianca, offering up one surprise after another.
episodes.title: Minccino - Neat and Tidy!

episodes.synopsis: Arriving in Nacrene City, our Heroes discover the Gym has a most unusual location and situation.
episodes.title: A Night in the Nacrene Museum!

episodes.synopsis: The day for Ash's Nacrene City Gym Battle challenge is here, and Lenora isn't about to go easy on our Hero.
episodes.title: The Battle According to Lenora!

episodes.synopsis: With Ash's rematch challenge at the Nacrene City Gym coming soon, the first order of business is some serious special training.
episodes.title: Rematch at the Nacrene Gym!

episodes.synopsis: Ash's Pokémon Egg is ready to hatch, and our Heroes are in for some surprising adventures as a result.
episodes.title: Scraggy - Hatched to Be Wild!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Castelia City, our heroes lose their bearings in a large forest but find something there that makes up for being lost.
episodes.title: Sewaddle and Burgh in Pinwheel Forest!

episodes.synopsis: Discovering a brand new Poké Mart on their way to Castelia City, our Heroes come across a most unusual Pokémon Connoisseur.
episodes.title: A Connoisseur's Revenge!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Castelia City, our heroes come across their old Pokémon friend Sandile, and three mischievous Pokémon who are anything but friendly.
episodes.title: Dancing with the Ducklett Trio!

episodes.synopsis: As our Heroes close in on Castelia City, crossing the Skyarrow Bridge proves more complicated then they thought it would be.
episodes.title: The Lost World of Gothitelle

episodes.synopsis: After arriving in Castelia City, our heroes discover an enormous colony of Venipede swarming the city and threatening its citizens.
episodes.title: A Venipede Stampede!

episodes.synopsis: The exciting moment for Ash's Gym Battle with Burgh, the Castelia Gym Leader, has finally arrived.
episodes.title: Battling for the Love of Bug-Types!

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes, along with their old friend Bianca, continue toward the Nimbasa Gym, they come across a Pokémon that Bianca just has to catch.
episodes.title: Emolga the Irresistible!

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes continue toward Nimbasa City, Iris's new friend Emolga proves just how amazing and unpredictable a Pokémon can be.
episodes.title: Emolga and the New Volt Switch!

episodes.synopsis: Seeking shelter from a raging rain storm, our heroes enter what appears to be an empty mansion, but what turns out to be anything BUT empty.
episodes.title: Scare at the Litwick Mansion!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Nimbasa City and Ash's fourth Gym Battle challenge, our heroes meet a fledgling Trainer with an important decision to make.
episodes.title: The Dragon Master's Path!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Nimbasa City, our heroes come across a Trainer and his Blitzle who put Oshawott to the battle test.
episodes.title: Oshawott's Lost Scalchop!

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes continue their journey to Nimbasa City, they encounter a lovesick Cottonee with confidence issues.
episodes.title: Cottonee in Love!

episodes.synopsis: Continuing to Nimbasa City, our heroes witness a mysterious UFO and Pokémon, with even more mysterious origins.
episodes.title: A UFO for Elgyem!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Nimbasa City, our heroes run into Ash's rival Trip, leading to a third battle between two very determined Trainers.
episodes.title: Ash and Trip's Third Battle!

episodes.synopsis: Many of our heroes' Pokémon have fallen ill from the poison spores of a group of Foongus, and Oshawott must face his fear in order to find the cure.
episodes.title: Facing Fear with Eyes Wide Open!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Nimbasa City, our heroes meet a Dragon Buster named Georgia who unexpectedly changes the relationship between Iris and Excadrill.
episodes.title: Iris and Excadrill Against the Dragon Buster!

episodes.synopsis: While on their way to Nimbasa City, our heroes' lunch is interrupted by a feisty Roggenrola, which leads them to thwart a sinister Team Rocket plan.
episodes.title: Gotta Catch a Roggenrola!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Nimbasa City, our heroes get involved in an investigation of disappearing Audino and meet a couple of budding young sleuths.
episodes.title: Where Did You Go, Audino?

episodes.synopsis: Reuniting with their old friends, Professor Juniper and Dr. Fennel, our heroes witness the restoration of the ancient Pokémon Archen.
episodes.title: Archeops in the Modern World!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Nimbasa City and Ash's next Gym Battle, a fishing competition "lures" our heroes into a sinister Team Rocket plot.
episodes.title: A Fishing Connoisseur in a Fishy Situation!

episodes.synopsis: A discussion about favorite movies and movie actors leads our heroes to a memorable encounter with a budding filmmaker and his amazing partner, Zorua.
episodes.title: Movie Time! Zorua in The Legend of the Pokémon Knight!

episodes.synopsis: The day of the Nimbasa Town Pokémon Battle Tournament is here for our heroes, and it's a happy meeting of lots of old friends as well.
episodes.title: Reunion Battles in Nimbasa!

episodes.synopsis: It's Cilan versus Trip during round one of the Nimbasa Town Club Battle! Then, for round two, it's Ash versus Georgia.
episodes.title: Cilan versus Trip, Ash verus Georgia!

episodes.synopsis: The second round bouts of the Club Battle rage on, culminating in a roaring battle between Iris's agile Emolga and Stephan's powerful Sawk.
episodes.title: The Club Battle Hearts of Fury: Emolga vs Sawk!

episodes.synopsis: The moment for the final round of the Nimbasa Pokémon Club Battle has arrived, with two good friends battling head-to-head.
episodes.title: Club Battle Finale: A Hero's Outcome!

episodes.synopsis: A surprise appearance by none other than Meowth has helped our heroes to solve one problem after another.
episodes.title: Meowth's Scrafty Tactics!

episodes.synopsis: Continuing their journey and still accompanied by Meowth, our heroes come across a Purrloin in distress, though not everyone buys its pleas for help.
episodes.title: Purrloin, Sweet or Sneaky?

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Nimbasa City, our heroes, along with Meowth, have found themselves in a dream they can't seem to awaken from.
episodes.title: Beheeyem, Duosion and the Dream Thief!

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes, traveling with Meowth, approach Nimbasa City, they discover a lost Cubchoo, which leads them into a dangerous confrontation.
episodes.title: The Beartic Mountain Feud!

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes have arrived in Nimbasa City, unaware that a crisis of major proportions is about to be unleashed.
episodes.title: Crisis from the Underground Up!

episodes.synopsis: As Team Rocket tries to steal the Pokémon from the Nimbasa City Pokémon Center, our heroes must stop Team Rocket's Ghost Train at all costs.
episodes.title: Battle for the Underground!

episodes.synopsis: After meeting the Nimbasa City Gym Leader, Elesa, our heroes encounter an old friend with a surprise guest.
episodes.title: Enter Elesa, Electrifying Gym Leader!

episodes.synopsis: The stakes are high for Ash winning his fourth Unova Gym Badge at the Nimbasa Gym, and our hero's taking no chances.
episodes.title: Dazzling the Nimbasa Gym!

episodes.synopsis: Spending the day in Nimbasa City, Cilan has a special challenge in mind, while our heroes discover a fellow trainer in need.
episodes.title: Lost at the Stamp Rally!

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes prepare to leave Nimbasa City, they bump into Ash's rival, Trip, who introduces them to someone they had only dreamed of meeting.
episodes.title: Ash vs. the Champion!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Driftveil City, our heroes meet an enterprising young man with three dedicated friends and a dream.
episodes.title: A Maractus Musical!

episodes.synopsis: Stopping at a Pokémon Center on their way to Driftveil City, our heroes meet a young Pokémon photographer on the mission of a lifetime.
episodes.title: The Four Seasons of Sawsbuck!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Driftveil City and Ash's next Gym Battle, our heroes meet a demanding Gothita with a crush on Scraggy.
episodes.title: Scraggy and the Demanding Gothita!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Driftveil City and Ash's next Gym Battle, our heroes come across some very special Pokémon in a very special place.
episodes.title: The Lonely Deino!

episodes.synopsis: Arriving in Driftveil City, our heroes meet a fascinating hometown resident with a secret.
episodes.title: The Mighty Accelguard to the Rescue!

episodes.synopsis: While Ash prepares for his upcoming Gym Battle with Clay, a surprise visitor with a dilemma offers both Ash and Cilan the opportunity to help.
episodes.title: A Call for Brotherly Love!

episodes.synopsis: What started as a trip to Milos Island to find Revival Herbs has turned into a cataclysmic battle of legendary proportions.
episodes.title: Stopping the Rage of Legends!: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: In search of scarce Revival Herbs, our heroes are now faced with the potential destruction of Milos Island.
episodes.title: Stopping the Rage of Legends!: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: With a bag full of revival herbs, our heroes have returned to Driftveil City, and Ash is raring to battle gym leader Clay.
episodes.title: Battling the King of the Mines!

episodes.synopsis: Continuing their journey to Mistralton City, our heroes encounter Chargestone Cave and a dilemma for its occupants.
episodes.title: Crisis at Chargestone Cave!

episodes.synopsis: Ash and his friends witness a dramatic Pokémon trade and evolution -- and the excitement has only begun.
episodes.title: Evolution Exchange Excitement!

episodes.synopsis: The elder Prof. Juniper has invited our heroes to join him in what he promises will be an exciting adventure -- and he keeps his promise.
episodes.title: Explorers of the Hero's Ruin!

episodes.synopsis: An encounter with Pikachu's rival from the past puts our heroes in the middle of a bullying confrontation.
episodes.title: Battling the Bully!

episodes.synopsis: An encounter with some very angry Bouffalant forces our heroes to take some unexpected precautions.
episodes.title: Baffling the Bouffalant!

episodes.synopsis: Arriving at the Mistralton City Gym, our heroes are shocked to discover a leader with a battle style they never would have imagined.
episodes.title: Cilan Takes Flight!

episodes.synopsis: Not only is the Mistralton City Gym Jet Badge on the line, the Gym Leader's method of battling is, as well.
episodes.title: An Amazing Aerial Battle!

episodes.synopsis: After reuniting with two old friends, our heroes prepare to participate in a competition that takes making a wish to a higher level.
episodes.title: Climbing the Tower of Success!

episodes.synopsis: Don George's Clubsplosion Tournament is getting underway, and our heroes obviously have several rivals with scores to settle.
episodes.title: The Clubsplosion Begins!

episodes.synopsis: Round one of the Clubsplosion Tournament rages on, and the explosive action more than lives up to its name.
episodes.title: Search for the Clubultimate!

episodes.synopsis: As round one of the Clubsplosion nears completion, round two promises even more excitement with every match.
episodes.title: A Clubsplosion of Excitement!

episodes.synopsis: The Clubsplosion Tournament is all about intense head-to-head battling, but the final round is about to raise the battle bar high.
episodes.title: Commanding the Clubsplosion Crown!

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes continue toward Icirrus City, a joyous event precedes a kidnapping crisis.
episodes.title: Battling the Leaf Thieves!

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes continue their journey to the Icirrus City Gym, they wind up on Twist Mountain and in the middle of another evil Team Rocket plot.
episodes.title: A Restoration Confrontation!: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes battle to save their new Pokémon friends, the survival of an entire world is at stake.
episodes.title: A Restoration Confrontation!: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Stopping at Don George's Pokémon Battle Club on their way to Icirrus City, our heroes encounter a trainer with a surprising connection to their past.
episodes.title: Evolution By Fire!

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes near Icirrus City and Ash's next Gym Battle, they find themselves face-to-face with the star-studded stuff of legends.
episodes.title: Guarding the Guardian of the Mountain!

episodes.synopsis: The chance for Ash to earn his seventh Unova Gym badge is here, and it's a slippery slope indeed.
episodes.title: Caution: Icy Battle Conditions!

episodes.synopsis: While pursuing Ash's eighth Unova Gym badge, our heroes are summoned to a place where Cilan's Connoisseur skills are in high demand.
episodes.title: Clash of the Connoisseurs!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Virbank City, our heroes run into a familiar face and an icy emergency.
episodes.title: Crisis at Ferroseed Research!

episodes.synopsis: After our heroes arrive in Virbank City, an old friend gives them a taste of filmmaking they will never forget.
episodes.title: An Epic Defense Force!

episodes.synopsis: Ash's quest for his eighth Gym badge gets underway -- and the battle turns out to be a multimedia event indeed.
episodes.title: Rocking the Virbank Gym!: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Gym is jumping, the fans are cheering, and the quest for Ash's eighth Unova Gym badge is red-hot and rocking.
episodes.title: Rocking the Virbank Gym!: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected encounter with an old friend in Virbank City presents our heroes with unexpected challenges galore.
episodes.title: All for the Love of Meloetta!

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes have begun training for the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, and a couple of old friends come along for the wild ride.
episodes.title: Piplup, Pansage, and a Meeting of the Times!

episodes.synopsis: When our heroes take a break from special training, a mysterious island offers much more than they bargained for.
episodes.title: Expedition to Onix Island!

episodes.synopsis: As our heroes train for the upcoming Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, a worried neighbor of Cynthia's comes by for help.
episodes.title: The Mystery of the Missing Cubchoo!

episodes.synopsis: While our heroes continue preparations for the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup, a sudden emergency occurs.
episodes.title: Iris and the Rogue Dragonite!

episodes.synopsis: The Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup is off to a roaring start, as our heroes face rivals old and new.
episodes.title: Jostling for the Junior Cup!

episodes.synopsis: The second round of the Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup is off and running, while a battle between the winner and Alder waits in the wings.
episodes.title: Battling Authority Once Again!

episodes.synopsis: The exciting Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup continues, and the quarterfinals and finals hang in the balance.
episodes.title: Ash, Iris and Trip: Then There Were Three!

episodes.synopsis: The Pokémon World Tournament Junior Cup may be winding down, but new adventures are just beginning.
episodes.title: Goodbye, Junior Cup - Hello, Adventure!

episodes.synopsis: Our heroes' new friend, Cameron, needs to win his eighth Gym Badge in order to enter the Unova League.
episodes.title: The Road to Humilau!

episodes.synopsis: While Ash trains for entry into the Unova League, our heroes discover a Pokémon nursery that urgently needs their help.
episodes.title: Unrest at the Nursery!

episodes.synopsis: A sinister plot to take over the Unova region is taking shape, and our heroes are caught in the middle of it.
episodes.title: Meloetta and the Undersea Temple!

episodes.synopsis: "Operation Tempest" is under way with a fierce vengeance, and the fate of the Unova region hangs in the balance.
episodes.title: Unova's Survival Crisis!

seasons.title: Pokémon: BW Adventures in Unova and Beyond

episodes.synopsis: On their way to Dragon Village, Iris challenges the boys and their Pokemon to do battle with a group of women who think their Pokemon are superior.
episodes.title: Beauties Battling for Pride and Prestige!

episodes.synopsis: As Ash and his crew make their trek to Vertress City and the Unova League, they are challenged to a tag battle unlike anything they have experienced.
episodes.title: A Surface to Air Tag Battle Team!

episodes.synopsis: On their way to the Vertress City, Ash and his friends visit the Village of Dragons, where Iris is confronted with several life-changing challenges.
episodes.title: A Village Homecoming!

episodes.synopsis: As Iris takes on her battle challenge issued by Opelucid City Gym leader Drayden, little does she know what is truly in store for her.
episodes.title: Drayden Versus Iris: Past, Present and Future!

episodes.synopsis: Traveling to Vertress City and the Unova League, Ash and his friends are introduced to a brave family on a mission of service.
episodes.title: Team Eevee and the Pokémon Rescue Squad!

episodes.synopsis: The Unova League is off and running, and old friends and rivals reunite. Contestants throw themselves into the unrelenting action of battle.
episodes.title: Curtain Up, Unova League!

episodes.synopsis: As excitement in Vertress City builds to a fever pitch, the Unova League pairs friends and rivals, old and new, for intense battles.
episodes.title: Mission: Defeat Your Rival!

episodes.synopsis: While the Unova League prepares to move to the third round, Ash and his friends are faced with a perilous case of lost and found.
episodes.title: Lost at the League!

episodes.synopsis: As the Unova League progresses through the third round and barrels toward the quarterfinals, strategy and friendship lead the way.
episodes.title: Strong Strategy Steals the Show!

episodes.synopsis: In the fourth round of the Unova League, Cameron’s "secret weapon" turns out to be more than anyone thought -- including Cameron.
episodes.title: Cameron's Secret Weapon!

episodes.synopsis: As the Unova League roars toward the final match, the competition becomes more fierce, and the strength and skill levels reach amazing heights.
episodes.title: A Unova League Evolution!

episodes.synopsis: Now that the Unova League is over, the gang contemplates what the future holds, while a new friend helps them deal with a blast from the past.
episodes.title: New Places...Familiar Faces!

episodes.synopsis: Bound for the White Ruins to meet Prof. Cedric Juniper, Ash's crew meets a young man with an unusual gift who helps them when trouble calls.
episodes.title: The Name's N!

episodes.synopsis: After arriving in Aspertia City at the request of Prof. Juniper, Ash and company pay a visit to one of the most unusual gyms they have ever seen.
episodes.title: There's a New Gym Leader in Town!

episodes.synopsis: Continuing their journey to the White Ruins, Ash and his friends encounter a mysterious organization that has hatched a sinister plot.
episodes.title: Team Plasma's Pokémon Power Plot!

episodes.synopsis: Ash and his friends come across a Mareep ranch with some major leadership issues, and Team Rocket stands ready to capitalize on their woes.
episodes.title: The Light of Floccesy Ranch!

episodes.synopsis: Ash's crew once again runs into N, who has freed a Braviary held captive by Team Plasma and enlists their help bringing it to a Pokémon Center.
episodes.title: Saving Braviary!

episodes.synopsis: When Ash's crew and N arrive in Virbank City, they meet another group of heroes, and though their ideals clash, they find they have one in common.
episodes.title: The Pokémon Harbor Patrol!

episodes.synopsis: At a festival celebrating the sights and sounds of the Kanto region, Ash reunites with an old friend who shows what real staying power is all about.
episodes.title: The Fires of a Red-Hot Reunion!

episodes.synopsis: Team Plasma is determined to execute its evil plans, but Ash and N are willing to put themselves in harm's way to help the Pokémon.
episodes.title: Team Plasma's Pokémon Manipulation!

episodes.synopsis: As Ash and his gang continue their journey to the White Ruins, they meet two girls who share startling secrets about N and Team Plasma.
episodes.title: Secrets from Out of the Fog!

episodes.synopsis: Team Plasma, on a mission to control Pokémon, persuades Team Rocket to make Meowth stronger. Then Team Rocket's mission takes aim at Team Plasma.
episodes.title: Meowth, Colress and Team Rivalry!

episodes.synopsis: Ash's gang unites with Prof. Cedric Juniper at the White Ruins and learns that they are not alone in their quest for information about Reshiram.
episodes.title: Ash and N: A Clash of Ideals!

episodes.synopsis: As Team Plasma’s plan to steal the Light Stone unfolds, Ash's team and their friends do everything in their power to stop it.
episodes.title: Team Plasma and the Awakening Ceremony!

episodes.synopsis: As the evil plan to control Reshiram unfolds, the survival of the world lies in Team Plasma’s defeat. But can they really be conquered?
episodes.title: What Lies Beyond Truth and Ideals!

episodes.synopsis: Ash, Iris and Cilan head for Kanto on a cruise through the Decolore Islands, but not all their new adventures are the ones they planned.
episodes.title: Farewell, Unova! Setting Sail for New Adventures!

episodes.synopsis: Ash's crew tastes trouble when the cruise makes a stop on Honey Island, known for its unique colonies of Pokémon and its honey-flavored cuisine.
episodes.title: Danger, Sweet as Honey!

episodes.synopsis: As the gang continues their Decolore Island-hopping cruise, a shipboard jewel theft calls for some super-sleuthing from Cilan.
episodes.title: Cilan and the Case of the Purrloin Witness!

episodes.synopsis: Ash decides to participate in a very unusual contest, pitting his Oshawott against the Dewott named Caesar to see who will come out the victor.
episodes.title: Crowning the Scalchop King!

episodes.synopsis: The gang's boat passes through a mysterious fog en route to Mahora Island, where they discover an old Pokémon center that is operating illegally.
episodes.title: The Island of Illusions!

episodes.synopsis: Ash and his gang arrive on Torom Island, where they meet up with an old friend who is there on an important research mission.
episodes.title: To Catch a Rotom!

episodes.synopsis: As Ash and company cruise through the Decolore Islands, a surprise visit by a quartet of unusual pirates sets everyone on a different course.
episodes.title: The Pirates of Decolore!

episodes.synopsis: Ash and his friends tour the Decolore Islands by ship. One island in particular offers them a chance to change a life for the better -- forever.
episodes.title: Butterfree and Me!

episodes.synopsis: Exploring Capacia Island on the way to Kanto, little does Ash know that the path they follow will lead to places unimagined, as well as heartbreak.
episodes.title: The Path that Leads to Goodbye!

episodes.synopsis: Ash and his friends visit a seemingly lifeless part of Capacia Island and come upon a life-giving solution for the land's problem.
episodes.title: Searching for a Wish!

episodes.synopsis: Ash must stop Beheeyem from taking over an island town and free its people, Iris, Cilan -- and even Pikachu -- from the strange Pokémons' control.
episodes.title: Capacia Island UFO!

episodes.synopsis: Ash's gang meets a foreign reporter who is covering a harvest festival, where they enjoy a windfall of delicious berries and unexpected new friends.
episodes.title: The Journalist from Another Region!

episodes.synopsis: Arriving on a deserted island on a quest for treasure, Ash and his friends find something much more precious than they anticipated.
episodes.title: Mystery on a Deserted Island!

episodes.synopsis: When Ash runs into his old friend on his way to the Kanto region, Iris gets a chance to discover a true kindred spirit.
episodes.title: A Pokémon of a Different Color!

episodes.synopsis: As Ash and his team continue their tour of the Decolore Islands, an upcoming celestial event sets the stage for intrigue and delight.
episodes.title: Celebrating the Hero's Comet!

episodes.synopsis: As the team visits a Pokémon Center in the Decolore Islands, a surprise detour challenges them to help some new friends in need.
episodes.title: Go Go Gogoat!

episodes.synopsis: A playful moment on an island turns into a big misunderstanding, leaving Ash and his band of heroes with a major challenge.
episodes.title: Team Rocket's Shocking Recruit!

episodes.synopsis: When Cilan’s brothers arrive for a surprise visit, Cilan must face a chilling challenge to uphold their honor.
episodes.title: Survival of the Striaton Gym!

episodes.synopsis: As the crew nears Vermilion City and the end of their shipboard adventures, one familiar challenge forces them to spring into action.
episodes.title: Best Wishes Until We Meet Again!

episodes.synopsis: A visit to Pallet Town to see family and friends prompts Ash to evaluate his future and proves just how enduring his dreams really are.
episodes.title: The Dream Continues!
